content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, -1) and a furnace at position (0, 0)
- Assembling machine at position (2, 0) and inserter at position (3, 0) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position (0, 0) to the assembling machine at position (2, 0)

### Electricity generator at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (0, 1)
- Boiler at position (0, 2)
- Offshore pump at position (0, 3)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to crafting and resource collection
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items.
- Check the status of furnaces and other crafting machines to confirm they have the necessary resources.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to entity status
- Regularly check the status of your entities to ensure they are functioning correctly and have the necessary inputs.
